hints: The definition of dpÂ is a little unusual. Try to think more.
Let dp[l][r] be the maximum number of queries we can process if we want a[l], a[l + 1], ..., a[r - 1] not to be removed after processing dp[l][r] queries.
So dp[0][n] = 0 since we can not remove anything.
title: Maximum Number of Removal Queries That Can Be Processed I
